      • Library

        public Library(java.lang.String name,

        Constructor for Library class. It is used to initilize the dormList array with maxShelves. It also initilazes the numShelves to 0.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the library
        capacity - Max shelves the library can hold

        Parameters:

        capacity - integer representing the capacity of the Shelf to be added.
        Returns:
